descriptionText.attr1: A abandoned military outpost, barely functioning as a meeting point.
Dealing with goods normally gated behind legal barriers, Yellowstone is a trading hub for a variety of goods, including ships.
If you want to buy something, but aren't allowed to, the Shadow Traders are here to help. A loosely organized group facilitating illegal trade.
This base isn't officially recognized, making it essentially lawless. Anyone can dock, and no form of security is provided.
Yellowstone was originally a TSF base. It was abandoned during construction. A accident created instability in the tunnels, making further development too costly.
